Description: The following statement contains a magic number: if (cki.Key == ConsoleKey.S)              {                  for (Int32 i = 0; i < 6000; i++)                  {                      CallTheService(i);                  }              }              else if (cki.Key == ConsoleKey.A)              {                  for (Int32 i = 0; i < 6000; i++)                  {                      CallTheServiceAsynchronously(i);                  }              }
